name: Skeleton
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.

name: Stone Golem
description:
- Chases the character. Tankier but much slower.
- When character is in attack region, charge & attack in circle region.

name: Flaming Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire a projectile that deals damage to character on hit.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Mutated Spider
description:
- Spawn in group of 3 - 5. Less HP but faster.
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- When dead, leave a toxic area that deals damage on second.

name: Wild Boar
description:
- Chases the character.
- When character is in attack region, charge & run towards character, deal damage on touch.

name: Cheering Boar
description:
- Randomly choose a direction and keep moving in that direction.
- Bounce when colliding against the walls. 
- Buff SPD for other enemies within regions. (not stacking but reseting)
- Other enemies will have speed buff while within region and 1 second after leaving the region.

name: Jumping Spider
description:
- Chases the character. 
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Each 5 seconds, the spider will jump into the air and drop at player's position after a while.
- It will jump no matter how far the player is.
- There will be indicators to notice the player.

name: Teleport Wizard
description:
- Every 3 seconds, Teleport Wizard will disappear.
- After 2 seconds, it will resurface at a location 4 to 6 meters away from the player and shoot out 4 bullets in 4 equally spaced directions.

name: Tower
description:
- Immobile.
- Super high health.
- Shoot a bomb to player's position. The bomb can bounce 2 times. Explode immediately when collided.
- When the bomb exploded, left a fire area for 5 seconds.

name: Novice Necromancer
description:
- Stay at the spawn location.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.
- For seconds, spawn 2 - 3 Novice Summoned.

name: Healing Spider
description:
- For each 5 seconds, approaches the character with random offset. 
- Throw 3 - 5 Bombs around its position.
- The bomb will explode when hitting the ground. Dealing damage to player and heal other enemies within region.

name: Novice Summoned
description:
- Run towards player.
- Explode on character touch, on death - deals damage to ANY ENTITIES.

name: Speed Skeleton
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Each 10 seconds, it will move 2 times faster in 2.5 seconds.
- The timer only resets when 2.5 seconds buff is over.

name: Persistent Skeleton
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Turn into another color zombie on the first death. (some animation to show the turning phase)
- The zombie's health will be halved but move 2 times faster, its attack increase 50%.

name: Taunt Golem
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Being attacked while attacking receive 2 times damage.
- Character is forced to shoot the taunting enemy when it enters character's shooting range.
- If there are more than 1 Taunters, the character will shoot randomly to one of them.

name: Sniper Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- When character is in its range, it starts to charge its attack.
- An shooting indicator will appear, change its direction towards character.
- After being ready, the indicator will flash for a little bit then it shoots the projectile towards character. Deal damage on touch and can be blocked by obstacles.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Rock Thrower
description:
- Randomly choose a direction and keep moving in that direction. 
- Bounce when colliding against the walls.
- Throw 3-4 bombs around its position every while.

name: Shotgun Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire multiple projectiles that deals damage to character on hit.
- Those projectiles will have random speed from min to max in random direction towards character.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Fire Boar
description:
- Randomly choose a direction and keep moving in that direction. 
- Bounce when colliding against the walls.
- Leave a trail that deals damage to player on touch by second. 
- Parts of trail will slowly disappear over time.

name: Curved Bullet Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire a projectile that deals damage to character on hit.
- The projectile moves curvely around the straight the direction from it to the character.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Homing Bullet Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire 1 projectile that deals damage to character on hit.
- Projectiles will follow the character for 5 seconds then dropping to the ground.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Nightmare Lesser Zombie
description: Chases the character, deal damage on touch.

name: Nightmare Mutated Zombie
description:
- Chases the character. Tankier but much slower.
- When character is in attack region, charge & attack in circle region.
- When charging, destroy all of the projectiles that enter the region.

name: Nightmare Mutated Spiders
description:
- Spawn in group of 3 - 5. Less HP but faster.
- Chases the character, deal damage on touch.
- When dead, leave a toxic area that deals damage on second.
- The poison is bigger and having slow effect.

name: Nightmare Flaming Skull
description:
- Fire 3 projectiles that deals damage to character on hit.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Nightmare Wild Boar
description:
- Chases the character.
- When character is in attack region, charge & run towards character, deal damage on touch.
- Leaving a fire trail during dashing.

name: Wrestling Golem
description:
- Chases the character. 
- When character is in attack region, charge and dash toward, dealing damage in circle region.

name: Taunt Golem
description:
- Chases the character. Super tanky.
- When character is in detect region, they are forced to shoot it instead.
- When character is in attack region, charge & attack in circle region.

name: Spidermum
description:
- Chases the character. Tankier than normal spiders.
- When character is in attack region, front attack.
- Spawn 3 - 5 Mutated Spiders on death.

name: Teleport Wizard 2
description:
- Every 3 seconds, Teleport Wizard will disappear.
- After 2 seconds, it will resurface at a location 4 to 6 meters away from the player and shoot out 4 bullets in 4 equally spaced directions.
- The bullet will move in rotation.

name: Captured Hand
description:
- Chases the character. 
- When character is in attack region, attack and capture the character, make them immobile for 1 second.

name: Warfare Nurse
description:
- Move & Bounce.
- Throw 1 buff each 2 seconds within the range of x metres. 
- The buff will add speed and heal the allies.

name: Gatling Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire 1 projectile that deals damage to character on hit each 0.2s, 5 in total.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Bomb Thrower
description:
- Randomly choose a direction and keep moving in that direction. 
- Chose a random direction when colliding against the walls.
- Throw 3-4 bombs around its position every while. 
- The bomb explodes will leave a fire area dealing damage per second on touch.
- The fire area will remain for 10 seconds.

name: Poison Trail
description:
- Randomly choose a direction and keep moving in that direction. 
- Chose a random direction when colliding against the walls.
- While moving, leave a trail that can deal damage to player.
- Parts of trail will slowly disappear after x seconds.

name: Ghost
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Each 5 seconds, turn into transparent that let the bullet pass through without dealing any damage.

name: Fearful Ghost
description:
- Chases the character. Tankier but much slower.
- When character is in attack region, charge the fear skill while keep moving.
- When the charge completes, deal damage and fear the character within range.

name: Vengeful Ghost
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Each 5 seconds, turn into transparent that let the bullet pass through without dealing any damage.
- When dies, it has 25% chance to turn into a projectile that follows the character for 3 seconds, deal damage on touch.

name: Persistent Ghost
description:
- Chases the character.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Each 5 seconds, turn into transparent that let the bullet pass through without dealing any damage.
- When dies, it has 15% chance to revive itself. The chance reduces by half each time.

name: Bounce Bullet Skull
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire a projectile that deals damage to character on hit.
- The projectile can bounce against obstacles for 1 time.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Web Spider
description:
- Chases the character. 
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Each 5 seconds, the spider will jump into the air and drop at player's position after a while.
- It will jump no matter how far the player is.
- There will be indicators to notice the player.
- Spawn a web that slows the player 50% at landing's position. Lasting for 5 seconds.

name: Water Wizard
description:
- Chases the character.
- When the character enters its attack region, it starts to cast spell that create a circle under the character's feet. Within region, character's movespeed reduces by 20%.
- After 2 seconds, it exlodes, deals damage to player within range.

name: Shield Golem
description:
- Chases the character.
- Reduce 99% receceive damage from all sources while not attacking player.
- When the character enters attack region, it starts to attack. The 99% damage reduction will not be applied during this phase.

name: Paralysis Spider
description:
- Chases the character with extreamly high speed.
- Super low health.
- Deals damage on touch and can paralyze player (immobile) for 1 second. Self-destructed.

name: Teleport Wizard 3
description:
- Every 3 seconds, Teleport Wizard will disappear.
- After 2 seconds, it will resurface at a location 4 to 6 meters away from the player and shoot out 3 bullets to player.

name: Wind Cutter
description:
- Chases the character.
- When the character enters its attack region, it will slam to the ground, create an air surge that moves towards the character, deal damage on touch.

name: Necromancer
description:
- Run when the character enters its detect region. 
- Can randomly spawn Vengeful Ghost or Great Ghost / having own weigths.

name: Great Ghost
description:
- Chases the character.
- Each 10 seconds, set a shield that destroys all entered projectiles from the character. Remains for 3 seconds.
- Attack when the character enters its attack region.

name: Hell Golem
description:
- Chases the character. Super tanky.
- Attack if the character is in front of it.
- Have 10% to reflect the character's bullets. (change visual)

name: Trap Placer
description:
- Pick a direction at first then move and bounce.
- Place a trap at current position each 3 seconds.
- If current position already had another trap, place randomly next to it.
- The trap will ground the character (immobile) for 1 seconds, also deals damage.

name: Soul Cannon
description:
- Immobile. Cannot die.
- Shoot a giant bullet to the sky that fall at the character each 5 second.
- Will automically be disabled when all other enemies have been defeated.

name: Homing Demon
description:
- Chases the character.
- Fire 3 projectiles that deals damage to character on hit.
- Projectiles will follow the character for 5 seconds then dropping to the ground.
- Run away when character gets in detect region.

name: Maniac Golem
description:
- Chases the character.
- Each 3 seconds, it will choose 1 from 3 actions:
+ If distance to player is x3 attack region, jump to the character.
+ If distance to player is x2 attack region, dash to the character.
+ If within the attack region, attack.

name: Hell Boar
description: - Move & Bounce to the character. Deal damage on touch.

name: Soul Wizard
description:
- Every 3 seconds, Teleport Wizard will disappear.
- After 2 seconds, it will resurface at a location 4 to 6 meters away from the player and shoot out 1 bullet to player.
- The bullet will explode to 3 other smaller projectiles that bounce against the obstacles.

name: Bone Tricker
description:
- Chases the character.
- If the character is in detect region, throw a bone that will come back to it. (boomerang)
- If the character is in attack region, attack.
